1370: Lotijn moved to Cromme straet.D.7 after marriage.
Got married to Katerina at age 20 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Katerina, Meynolphus, at age 21.
1372: Had a son with Katerina, Lambrecht, at age 22.
1375: Had a daughter with Katerina, Meynseth, at age 25.
1382: Had a daughter with Katerina, Berta, at age 32.
1383: Had a daughter with Katerina, Saswe, at age 33.
1385: Had a daughter with Katerina, Reymodis, at age 35.
1387: Lost daughter Saswe when Saswe was 5 years old.
1390: Had a son with Katerina, Radulphus, at age 40.
1392: Had a daughter with Katerina, Marisseis, at age 42.
1393: Lost daughter Marisseis when Marisseis was 2 years old.
1394: Had a son with Katerina, Bollarde, at age 44.
1398: Lost daughter Meynseth when Meynseth was 23 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
